channel.title: Vac R&D Roadmaps and Reports
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Vac R&D Roadmaps and Reports

item.title: ACZ Research Destination
item.description: Providing ACZ research informative materials for the ecosystem.

item.title: de-mls Testnet
item.description: Implementation of a de-mls testnet, extending the previous poc and writing the corresponding RFC.

item.title: IFT ZK Calls
item.description: Preparation and conducting the ZK meetings.

item.title: LibP2P mix protocol
item.description: Publishing a raw RFC specifying libp2p mixnet protocol and implementing a PoC.

item.title: Think tank
item.description: Publishing a reviewing document for the cryptography modules of IFT projects.

item.title: Zerokit v.0.6
item.description: Implementation of the next release of Zerokit.

item.title: de-MLS Multi Admin
item.description: involves finalizing the de-MLS RFC with multi-admin support, implementing by extending the single admin approach with on-chain admin consensus, and also submitting to the EF grant program with a messaging application project that introduces decentralization, censorship resistance, and DAO coordination, or DeFi alerts.

item.title: IFT ZK Calls
item.description: Preparation and conducting the ZK call meetings.

item.title: LibP2P mix protocol
item.description: Achieving mixnet's PoC on Waku network, updating the RFC for libp2p compatibility, sharing results, and also submitting to the EF grant program with a privacy project that introduces sender anonymity to Ethereum nodes for censorship resistanceness.

item.title: MDS Checker
item.description: Creating the Rust crate for MDS matrix security checker and a blogpost.
